Submodules

streamlit_authenticator.params module

Configuration parameters and links for the Streamlit-Authenticator package.

Module contents

Script description: This script imports the main module of this library and also provides unit testing commands for development.

Libraries imported: - yaml: Module implementing the data serialization used for human readable documents. - streamlit: Framework used to build pure Python web applications.
